questions.questionText: Consider tables R(A,B) and S(B,C) and a view V = select A,C from R,S where R.B=S.B. [[may want to format]] Suppose R={(1,5),(2,5)} and S={(5,10)}, so V={(1,10),(2,10)}. The user wants to delete tuple (2,10) from V. Which of the following modifications to R and/or S does NOT correctly reflect this modification?
